ABOUT ME

My name is Diogo Soares da Silva. For the past eight years I was an academic, conducting research in universities in Portugal, the Netherlands and the UK.

These days, I am a full-stack web developer with attention to detail. I mostly create web applications using JavaScript (with React) and PHP (with Laravel), but I am constantly reading about new languages and frameworks — maybe I'll learn the next one while working with you.

When not coding, you might find me surrounded by music — crafting playlists, digging for vinyl, and standing in front of you on a concert — or pictures of cute animals.
